text: Platform 1 Xinpu Minsheng station is a station on the Taipei Metro's Circular line. The station was opened on 31 January 2020. It is located in Banqiao District, New Taipei, Taiwan. An out-of-station transfer to the Bannan line is available through Xinpu metro station. The two stations are roughly 250 m apart. ==Station layout== {|table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=50 rowspan=5 valign=top|4F |- |style="border-right:solid 2px black;border- left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;border-top:solid 1px gray;" colspan=2|Side platform, doors will open on the right |- |style="border- bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100|Platform 1 |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=390|← Circular line toward New Taipei Industrial Park (Y18 Touqianzhuang) |- |Platform 2 |→ Circular line toward Dapinglin (Y16 Banqiao) → |- |style="border-top:solid 2px black;border-right:solid 2px black;border- left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" colspan=2|Side platform, doors will open on the right |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=50 valign=top|3F |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Concourse |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Lobby, Information desk, automatic ticket machines, one-way faregates, shops, restrooms (inside paid area) |- |style="border- bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=50 rowspan=10 valign=top|Street Level |style="border-top:solid 0px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100 valign=top|Ground Level |style="border-top:solid 0px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=390 valign=top|Entrance/Exit |} ==Exits== *Single Exit: Section 3, Minsheng Rd. 20px ==Around the station== * Banqiao Post Office * Dahan Bridge * Sino-British Hospital (located between this station & Banqiao station) ==References== Category:Taipei Metro stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2020 Category:2020 establishments in Taiwan
title: Xinpu Minsheng metro station
